name: Trent & Gary's Tale
description:
Trent and Gary's Tale

is a metroidvania genre game submitted for the Metroidvania Month 17 game jam. 

In this game, you play as Trent the treant, helping his newfound friend Gary restore his body and save the forest.

Explore, defeat enemies and collect fragments to complete the game!

Features
  • Unlockable abilities and collectables
  • Multiple enemy types and areas to explore
  • Ingame tutorial
  • Menus, pause and save game feature
  • Dialogues, sounds and music
Development

I worked on this project as a solo developer, doing some pixel art but mostly using and modifying available art assets. 

Being my first game, I learned very much during the 1 month period of its development.

Sadly, I did not have time to add all the features I would have liked the game to have, but I am still proud of this game. 

To develop the game, I used the Godot game engine and Aseprite.

If you try the game, please leave a comment :)
